meanings.sent1: The lecithinases in our bodies help break down lecithin for digestion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the role of lecithinases in the digestive system.
meanings.sent3: The lecithinases at the party were busy breaking down snacks instead of socializing.
meanings.sent4: The lecithinases worked like tiny scissors, cutting through the lecithin molecules.
meanings.sent5: The lecithinases were like little helpers, breaking down lecithin into smaller parts.

meanings.definition: Lecithinases: Substances that break down lecithin.
meanings.sent1: Some foods contain natural lecithinases that aid in digestion.
meanings.sent2: The lecithinases in the detergent help remove grease stains effectively.
meanings.sent3: The lecithinases in the kitchen seemed to magically dissolve the sticky lecithin residue.
meanings.sent4: The lecithinases in the body acted like little cleaners, breaking down lecithin deposits.
meanings.sent5: The lecithinases were like secret agents, stealthily breaking down lecithin molecules.
